Control Name: 3.11.5 You have a response plan for network performance problems that includes traffic capturing tools.
Control Statement: Network capture tooling can capture the network traffic and dive deeper into the interactions at the network layer that may affect your application due to network configuration and/or other network traffic issues.

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 3.11 What common problems do you have steps to troubleshoot in your operations playbook?
